name: HTML
description: Proficient in semantic HTML5 markup, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and accessibility.

name: CSS
description: Expertise in CSS3 for layout design, animations, and responsive web development using frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS.

name: JavaScript
description: Strong grasp of JavaScript (ES6+) for dynamic front-end interactions and asynchronous programming, with experience in frameworks like React.js.

name: React.js
description: Proficient in React.js for building single-page applications (SPAs), reusable UI components, and state management using hooks and context API.

name: Node.js
description: Familiarity with Node.js for server-side development, RESTful APIs, and integration with databases like MongoDB.

name: MongoDB
description: Basic knowledge of MongoDB for NoSQL database management and integration with Node.js applications.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: Hands-on experience in utility-first CSS framework, creating custom designs with Tailwind's responsive and scalable components.

name: Firebase
description: Experience in Firebase for real-time database, authentication, cloud functions, and hosting static websites.

name: Express.js
description: Understanding of Express.js for building web applications and RESTful APIs, handling middleware, and routing.

name: Daisy UI
description: Knowledge of Daisy UI for Tailwind CSS, leveraging its components to streamline UI development and enhance user interfaces.
